guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"94gu1","text":"OBJECTIVE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"309vk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c2sp","text":"To outline procedures for total nucleic acid extraction from swab samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4ag2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7gh9","text":"SUMMARY/SCOPE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93qk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a17kb","text":"The overarching aim of the REDI-NET is to develop a collaborative laboratory network between domestic and international partnering institutions to address disease surveillance needs in order to effectively detect, predict and contain potentially emergent zoonosis. This SOP provides guidance on procedures for total nucleic acid extraction from swab samples to provide materials for downstream library preparation and sequencing for pathogen detection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":27,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"350i4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3olat","text":"RESPONSIBLE PERSON","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7skg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1qng","text":"Principal Investigator, Study Coordinator, Entomology Component Lead, Managers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa5ip","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2plr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nt75","text":"MAINTENANCE OF EQUIPMENT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mpsq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dd3o","text":"Caution on RNA handling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejocf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k9ep","text":"RNases are very stable and difficult to inactivate, and only minute amounts are sufficient to destroy RNA. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vkip","text":"Care should be taken to avoid inadvertently introducing RNases into the samples during or after the purification procedure. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd727","text":"Sample handling and extraction should be performed under an extraction hood and respecting Good Laboratory Practices. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f05f","text":"Use filter tips all the time.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jcq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vuaj","text":"Storage of the buffers from IndiMag Pathogen Kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5n65","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29v75","text":"Proteinase K is stable for at least 1 year after delivery when stored at   (15-25Â°C). To store for more than 1 year or if ambient temperature often exceeds 25Â°C, storage at   is recommended. Do not add Proteinase K directly to the Buffer VXL mixture! This can cause clogs or precipitates.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":173,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"55oum","text":"Precipitation may form after storage at low temperature or prolonged storage. To dissolve precipitate, incubate Buffer VXL or ACB for   at  , with occasional shaking.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":134,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"39plk","text":"Reconstituted Buffer AW1 can be stored at   (15-25Â°C) for up to 1 year. Mix well after adding Ethanol.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evd91","text":"Buffer AVE is RNase-free upon delivery. It contains sodium azide, an antimicrobial agent that prevents growth of RNase-producing organisms. However, as this buffer does not contain any RNase degrading chemicals, it will not actively inhibit RNases introduced by inappropriate handling. When handling Buffer AVE, take extreme care to avoid contamination with RNases. Follow general precautions for working with RNA, such as frequent change of gloves and keeping tubes closed whenever possible.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dl33l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26trn","text":"QUALITY CONTROL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f9aj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54isi","text":"This SOP is reviewed by the applicable supervisor annually or as required in order to maintain its relevance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b773j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n9q9","text":"APPENDICES","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59du5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v49d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqvfv","text":"APPENDIX 1.
